data.text: One day, towards the end of Summer Training Camp―
data.processed: 󠁿One day, towards the end of Summer Training Camp―

data.text:
Right, right! Since all the usual suspects are here, 
we can live it up on the beach!!
data.name: Daitaku Helios
data.processed:
󠁿Right, right! Since all the usual suspects are here, 
󠁿we can live it up on the beach!!

data.text:
Holdin' our own Summer Festival, sounds awesome! 
No choice but to do it now～!!
data.name: Gyaru C
data.processed:
󠁿Holdin' our own Summer Festival, sounds awesome! 
󠁿No choice but to do it now～!!

data.text: Right～!?
data.name: Daitaku Helios
data.processed: 󠁿Right～!?

data.text:
Trai～Po～yo～! 
Summer means festivals, don't ya think!?
data.name: Daitaku Helios
data.processed:
󠁿Trai～Po～yo～! 
󠁿Summer means festivals, don't ya think!?

data.text:
I already got an okay anyways, 
so we gotta hold an Awe&Some festival, wei wei☆
data.name: Daitaku Helios
data.processed:
󠁿I already got an okay anyways, 
󠁿so we gotta hold an Awe&Some festival, wei wei☆

data.text:
To summarize what Daitaku Helios was saying, it seemed like they 
were already recruiting volunteers to help with their festival.
data.processed:
󠁿To summarize what Daitaku Helios was saying, it seemed like they 
󠁿were already recruiting volunteers to help with their festival.

data.text:
Trai-pi, you're coming right? You gotta☆ 
Let's max out those vibes together!
data.name: Daitaku Helios
data.processed:
󠁿Trai-pi, you're coming right? You gotta☆ 
󠁿Let's max out those vibes together!

data.text:
Well then, gonna go recruit some more accomplices! 
Get a move on～～☆
data.name: Daitaku Helios
data.processed:
󠁿Well then, gonna go recruit some more accomplices! 
󠁿Get a move on～～☆

data.text:
After that, Daitaku Helios continued on with training while 
also helping energetically with preparations―
data.processed:
󠁿After that, Daitaku Helios continued on with training while 
󠁿also helping energetically with preparations―

data.text: Ch-chan-Heli～!?!?!?
data.name: Gyaru D
data.processed: 󠁿Ch-chan-Heli～!?!?!?

data.text: Ugh…… what is this, it hurts～…… and where is this～?
data.name: Daitaku Helios
data.processed: 󠁿Ugh…… what is this, it hurts～…… and where is this～?

data.text:
Hm? Uuh～ ……my eyesight is flickering, 
thought I was looking at a disco ball.
data.name: Daitaku Helios
data.processed:
󠁿Hm? Uuh～ ……my eyesight is flickering, 
󠁿thought I was looking at a disco ball.

data.text:
Oh, what about the festival……! 
Preparations are probably―
data.name: Daitaku Helios
data.processed:
󠁿Oh, what about the festival……! 
󠁿Preparations are probably―

data.text:
Uuuughhh～…… so dizzy, 
I can't move～～～……
data.name: Daitaku Helios

choices.text: For now, you need to rest

data.processed:
󠁿Uuuughhh～…… so dizzy, 
󠁿I can't move～～～……

data.text: Eh-!? Then the festival…… ow～!!
data.name: Daitaku Helios
data.processed: 󠁿Eh-!? Then the festival…… ow～!!

data.text:
Trai-pi～…… 
You're not gonna say the festival is impossible, right? Right?
data.name: Daitaku Helios
data.processed:
󠁿Trai-pi～…… 
󠁿You're not gonna say the festival is impossible, right? Right?

data.text:
I want to hold that festival! 
We've been working hard, and I want it to succeed! And―
data.name: Daitaku Helios
data.processed:
󠁿I want to hold that festival! 
󠁿We've been working hard, and I want it to succeed! And―

data.text: Trai-pi, I promised to help you become a party peep～!!
data.name: Daitaku Helios
data.processed: 󠁿Trai-pi, I promised to help you become a party peep～!!

data.text:
Goin' with the flow in a serious festival～ 
isn't that what a party peep is all about? Right?
data.name: Daitaku Helios
data.processed:
󠁿Goin' with the flow in a serious festival～ 
󠁿isn't that what a party peep is all about? Right?

data.text:
I didn't want her hard work to go to waste. In order to repay 
her feelings, I wanted to continue the preparations……!
data.processed:
󠁿I didn't want her hard work to go to waste. In order to repay 
󠁿her feelings, I wanted to continue the preparations……!

data.text:
Huh? 
Trai-pi～…… Trainer??
data.name: Daitaku Helios
data.processed:
󠁿Huh? 
󠁿Trai-pi～…… Trainer??

data.text: Where are you going?? Heeeey!
data.name: Daitaku Helios

choices.text: Leave it to me and rest!
Leave it to me and rest!

data.processed: 󠁿Where are you going?? Heeeey!

data.text:
Eeeeh～!? Don't leave me behindーー! 
Agh! My head!
data.name: Daitaku Helios
data.processed:
󠁿Eeeeh～!? Don't leave me behindーー! 
󠁿Agh! My head!

data.text:
Party trainer……! Is chan-Heli okay? 
Is the festival doomed?
data.name: Gyaru A
data.processed:
󠁿Party trainer……! Is chan-Heli okay? 
󠁿Is the festival doomed?

data.text:
Ha!? Huh!? 
Party Trainer will……!?
data.name: Gyaru B
data.processed:
󠁿Ha!? Huh!? 
󠁿Party Trainer will……!?

data.text:
Oooh～, reserving the whole beach for a festival, huh…… 
I knew the students were up to something.
data.name: Veteran Trainer
data.processed:
󠁿Oooh～, reserving the whole beach for a festival, huh…… 
󠁿I knew the students were up to something.

data.text:
Alright. My students were saying they needed a breather. 
I'll try asking the other trainers too.
data.name: Veteran Trainer
data.processed:
󠁿Alright. My students were saying they needed a breather. 
󠁿I'll try asking the other trainers too.

data.text: Trainer……
data.name: Daitaku Helios
data.processed: 󠁿Trainer……

data.text:
With the help of Daitaku Helios' friends, and my fellow trainers, 
we managed to finish preparations. And then the next day――
data.processed:
󠁿With the help of Daitaku Helios' friends, and my fellow trainers, 
󠁿we managed to finish preparations. And then the next day――

data.text: Festival, Start! FOOOOOOO～～～～～!!
data.name: Everyone

choices.text: H-here we go, put your hands up～!

data.processed: 󠁿Festival, Start! FOOOOOOO～～～～～!!

data.text:
Buhaha! 
Party Trainer, awesome! You're a natural!
data.name: Gyaru B
data.processed:
󠁿Buhaha! 
󠁿Party Trainer, awesome! You're a natural!

data.text:
Don't forget about us! 
Yaaa～～～～～～y! Put your hands up!!
data.name: Veteran Trainer
data.processed:
󠁿Don't forget about us! 
󠁿Yaaa～～～～～～y! Put your hands up!!

data.text:
A techno sound rang out across the beach. Not just the Uma 
Musume, but even their trainers were going with the flow.
data.processed:
󠁿A techno sound rang out across the beach. Not just the Uma 
󠁿Musume, but even their trainers were going with the flow.

data.text:
Daitaku Helios had taught me how to party it up, 
and I was once again reminded of how dazzling she was―
data.processed:
󠁿Daitaku Helios had taught me how to party it up, 
󠁿and I was once again reminded of how dazzling she was―

data.text: If I could raise the vibes closer to her level……!!
data.processed: 󠁿If I could raise the vibes closer to her level……!!

data.text:
Even my trainer's letting loose! 
Uhaha! It's kinda mysterious!
data.name: Gyaru A
data.processed:
󠁿Even my trainer's letting loose! 
󠁿Uhaha! It's kinda mysterious!

data.text:
Trai-pi, Trai-pi～～～!! 
Let me join in too～～～～～!!
data.name: Daitaku Helios
data.processed:
󠁿Trai-pi, Trai-pi～～～!! 
󠁿Let me join in too～～～～～!!

data.text: After seein' this, there's no way I'd stay down! Check it☆
data.name: Daitaku Helios
data.processed: 󠁿After seein' this, there's no way I'd stay down! Check it☆

data.text:
And so, the party with students and trainers alike, 
went off without a hitch.
data.processed:
󠁿And so, the party with students and trainers alike, 
󠁿went off without a hitch.

data.text:
Aw man～. From here, 
we can barely see the fireworks, huh～!?
data.name: Daitaku Helios

choices.text: You could have gone with them……

data.processed:
󠁿Aw man～. From here, 
󠁿we can barely see the fireworks, huh～!?

data.text:
I couldn't leave ya all by yourself, Trai-poyo! 
Even if it's just the sound it's still wabi&sabi, 
right? That kind of emotion, right!?
data.name: Daitaku Helios
data.processed:
󠁿I couldn't leave ya all by yourself, Trai-poyo! 
󠁿Even if it's just the sound it's still wabi&sabi, 
󠁿right? That kind of emotion, right!?

data.text:
She said all that, but judging by the way her 
ears and tail flicked about, she must have been 
really looking forward to it. In that case――
data.processed:
󠁿She said all that, but judging by the way her 
󠁿ears and tail flicked about, she must have been 
󠁿really looking forward to it. In that case――

data.text:
Buha! 
Where were you hidin' those pom poms!?
data.name: Daitaku Helios
data.processed:
󠁿Buha! 
󠁿Where were you hidin' those pom poms!?

data.text:
Uhahahaha♪ 
Trai-pi, you're the best! Let me try!!
data.name: Daitaku Helios
data.processed:
󠁿Uhahahaha♪ 
󠁿Trai-pi, you're the best! Let me try!!

data.text:
Fireworks! Fireworks!! Another round of wicked fireworks☆ 
Hell yeah, max vibes!
data.name: Daitaku Helios
data.processed:
󠁿Fireworks! Fireworks!! Another round of wicked fireworks☆ 
󠁿Hell yeah, max vibes!

data.text: Hm? What's up?
data.name: Daitaku Helios

choices.text: Am I a party peep now……!?
Am I a party peep now……!?

data.processed: 󠁿Hm? What's up?

data.text:
Of course～～!! 
But way way way more than that☆
data.name: Daitaku Helios
data.processed:
󠁿Of course～～!! 
󠁿But way way way more than that☆

data.text:
I mean, today, you showed me your party soul, right!? 
That was seriously lit and god-like～.
data.name: Daitaku Helios
data.processed:
󠁿I mean, today, you showed me your party soul, right!? 
󠁿That was seriously lit and god-like～.

data.text:
I won't lose though! Next time I'll show you! 
Well, that's just how it is. That's why～―
data.name: Daitaku Helios
data.processed:
󠁿I won't lose though! Next time I'll show you! 
󠁿Well, that's just how it is. That's why～―

data.text: In the next race, I'll show you a god-like explosive runaway☆
data.name: Daitaku Helios
data.processed: 󠁿In the next race, I'll show you a god-like explosive runaway☆

data.text:
Honestly, there was still a lot I didn't understand about 
partying but― after coming in to contact with that passion just 
made me want to support her more.
data.processed:
󠁿Honestly, there was still a lot I didn't understand about 
󠁿partying but― after coming in to contact with that passion just 
󠁿made me want to support her more.

data.text: Boom boom boo～m☆ Fireworks, wei!!
data.name: Both
data.processed: 󠁿Boom boom boo～m☆ Fireworks, wei!!
